page.title: 19SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: At 0915 school Assembly is taken by a member of staff. Sometimes instead of assembly we have hymn practice taken by Mrs Gordon (conductor) and Mr Berisford (pianist). After assembly we have Maths or English sets. We also do Art and various topics. P.E. is another activity. During the day we have two 10 minute playtimes and a 1hr playtime for dinner. Every year at Christmas and during the summer bazaars are held. School jumble sales are held in school. At Christmas concerts are prepared and then tickets are sold to the parents, Grandparents etc. Open evenings are held at the end of a school year. Parents come into school to help in many areas. They also raise money to buy equipment for school.
